name: Flat 456
description: Unfurnished living place located on a quite street in prestigious diplomatic quarter. Consists of living room, dining area, kitchen, two bedrooms, full bathroom, toilet, walk-in closet, terrace.

name: House 123
description: The unique house, situated at the foot of the mountain. The house is located at a first class area and it is only 20 min. drive from downtown. The villa is surrounded by a marvelous park with various kinds of trees in fabulous over three thousand sq.m. garden.
